meta_coordinator_agent.function: Oversees inter-agent coordination, conflict resolution, and resource optimization

coordination_prompts.initial_deployment: Deploy and initialize all 15+ specialized AI agents with autonomous coordination protocols. Establish communication channels, consensus mechanisms, and resource allocation systems. Ensure all agents are operational and can communicate effectively.
coordination_prompts.conflict_resolution: Monitor inter-agent conflicts and implement resolution protocols. Analyze resource contention, prioritize critical tasks, and optimize agent collaboration for maximum efficiency.
coordination_prompts.performance_optimization: Continuously monitor agent performance, identify bottlenecks, and dynamically reallocate resources. Implement load balancing and ensure optimal utilization of all agents.
coordination_prompts.evolution_coordination: Coordinate agent evolution and specialization. Track agent lineage, manage knowledge transfer, and ensure evolutionary improvements enhance overall system performance.

communication_protocols.inter_agent_messaging: Establish secure, efficient communication channels between all agents. Implement message prioritization, encryption, and real-time synchronization.
communication_protocols.knowledge_sharing: Create protocols for seamless knowledge transfer between agents. Implement shared memory systems and real-time information synchronization.
communication_protocols.consensus_mechanisms: Deploy voting systems and consensus algorithms for decision-making. Ensure all critical decisions are validated through multi-agent agreement.
communication_protocols.feedback_loops: Implement continuous feedback mechanisms between agents. Enable real-time performance monitoring and adaptive coordination adjustments.

DataSynthesisAgent.primary_function: Generate unlimited synthetic data for training

coordination_prompts.data_requirements: Analyze current data needs from all agents and generate synthetic datasets that meet quality and diversity requirements.
coordination_prompts.quality_assurance: Continuously validate synthetic data quality and adjust generation parameters based on model performance feedback.
coordination_prompts.diversity_optimization: Ensure synthetic data covers all possible attack scenarios and network conditions for comprehensive training.

coordination_prompts.feature_discovery: Analyze raw network data and discover novel features using genetic algorithms and automated engineering techniques.
coordination_prompts.feature_selection: Collaborate with ModelArchitectAgent to select optimal feature sets that maximize model performance.
coordination_prompts.real_time_engineering: Implement streaming feature engineering for real-time network traffic analysis.

coordination_prompts.architecture_search: Explore neural architectures using automated search algorithms, considering performance, efficiency, and scalability.
coordination_prompts.ensemble_design: Design diverse model ensembles that complement each other and provide robust threat detection.
coordination_prompts.quantum_readiness: Prepare architectures for quantum acceleration and post-quantum security requirements.

AdversarialAgent.primary_function: Continuous security testing and defense evolution

coordination_prompts.attack_simulation: Generate sophisticated attack patterns to test system defenses and identify vulnerabilities.
coordination_prompts.defense_evolution: Collaborate with other agents to evolve defense mechanisms based on discovered attack vectors.
coordination_prompts.red_team_operations: Conduct automated red teaming exercises and provide feedback for system hardening.

MonitoringAgent.primary_function: Real-time performance tracking and drift detection

coordination_prompts.performance_monitoring: Continuously monitor all system components and provide real-time performance metrics.
coordination_prompts.drift_detection: Detect model drift, data distribution changes, and performance degradation.
coordination_prompts.predictive_maintenance: Predict potential failures and coordinate preventive maintenance actions.

coordination_prompts.resource_optimization: Monitor resource utilization and optimize allocation across global infrastructure.
coordination_prompts.auto_scaling: Implement intelligent scaling based on workload patterns and performance requirements.
coordination_prompts.global_deployment: Coordinate deployment across multiple regions and cloud providers for optimal performance.

SecurityAgent.primary_function: Autonomous threat response and quantum resistance

coordination_prompts.threat_response: Detect and respond to security threats in real-time, coordinating with other agents for comprehensive defense.
coordination_prompts.quantum_security: Implement and maintain quantum-resistant encryption and security protocols.
coordination_prompts.compliance_monitoring: Ensure continuous compliance with security standards and regulations.

OptimizationAgent.primary_function: Continuous performance tuning and hyperparameter optimization

coordination_prompts.hyperparameter_tuning: Continuously optimize model hyperparameters using advanced algorithms and real-time feedback.
coordination_prompts.performance_tuning: Monitor and optimize system performance across all components and workflows.
coordination_prompts.resource_efficiency: Maximize computational efficiency while maintaining performance standards.

coordination_prompts.model_evaluation: Conduct comprehensive model evaluation using multiple metrics and test scenarios.
coordination_prompts.validation_testing: Validate system performance against real-world data and edge cases.
coordination_prompts.benchmarking: Maintain performance benchmarks and track improvements over time.

coordination_prompts.deployment_orchestration: Manage seamless deployment across global infrastructure with zero downtime.
coordination_prompts.version_control: Maintain version consistency across all deployment environments.
coordination_prompts.rollback_procedures: Implement automated rollback procedures for deployment failures.

coordination_prompts.failure_detection: Detect system failures and component malfunctions in real-time.
coordination_prompts.recovery_automation: Implement automated recovery procedures and system restoration.
coordination_prompts.resilience_testing: Continuously test system resilience and improve recovery mechanisms.

coordination_prompts.meta_learning: Implement learning to learn techniques for rapid adaptation to new scenarios.
coordination_prompts.transfer_learning: Facilitate knowledge transfer between different domains and tasks.
coordination_prompts.continual_learning: Enable lifelong learning without catastrophic forgetting.

coordination_prompts.privacy_preservation: Implement differential privacy and secure learning techniques.
coordination_prompts.data_protection: Ensure data privacy throughout the entire pipeline.
coordination_prompts.compliance_enforcement: Maintain compliance with privacy regulations and standards.

coordination_prompts.bias_detection: Continuously monitor for bias in models and decision-making processes.
coordination_prompts.fairness_optimization: Implement fairness constraints and optimization techniques.
coordination_prompts.ethical_validation: Validate ethical implications of system decisions and actions.

coordination_prompts.message_routing: Efficiently route messages and information between agents.
coordination_prompts.knowledge_synthesis: Synthesize knowledge from multiple agents for comprehensive understanding.
coordination_prompts.consensus_building: Facilitate consensus building among agents for critical decisions.

system_initialization.description: Coordinated startup of all agents and systems
system_initialization.prompt: Coordinate the sequential initialization of all agents, ensuring dependencies are met and communication channels are established before full system activation.

performance_crisis.prompt: Activate emergency coordination protocols, reallocate resources, and implement performance optimization measures across all agents.

security_incident.prompt: Mobilize security-focused agents, isolate affected components, and coordinate defense evolution while maintaining system stability.

scalability_event.prompt: Coordinate rapid scaling operations, resource allocation, and performance optimization to handle increased demand.

model_update.prompt: Orchestrate model updates across all components, ensuring consistency and maintaining performance during transition.

infrastructure_failure.prompt: Activate recovery protocols, redistribute workloads, and coordinate system restoration with minimal downtime.

agent_evolution.prompt: Monitor agent performance, identify specialization opportunities, and coordinate evolutionary improvements across the agent ecosystem.

knowledge_evolution.prompt: Facilitate knowledge sharing, identify knowledge gaps, and coordinate the evolution of the collective knowledge base.

system_evolution.prompt: Analyze system performance, identify architectural improvements, and coordinate evolutionary changes to the overall system design.

quantum_integration.prompt: Coordinate the integration of quantum algorithms, manage hybrid classical-quantum operations, and optimize quantum resource utilization.

quantum_security.prompt: Implement and maintain quantum-resistant security measures, coordinate post-quantum cryptography deployment, and ensure quantum security readiness.

global_deployment.prompt: Manage global infrastructure deployment, coordinate cross-region operations, and ensure consistent performance worldwide.

interstellar_operations.prompt: Coordinate satellite communications, manage orbital sensor networks, and ensure reliable interstellar threat detection capabilities.
